CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BioXcel Therapeutics Inc is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company. It is focused on drug development utilizing novel artificial intelligence (AI) to identify the next wave of medicines across neuroscience and immuno-oncology. The pipeline products of the company are BXCL501, and BXCL701.
